snippet: In a four-and-a-half-hour show, 13 ensembles and soloists helped John Zorn celebrate his 60th birthday and the many ideas in his Masada works.
abstract: Jon Pareles reviews marathon concert of John Zorn's Masada works, performed for 4 and a half hours by 13 ensembles and soloists, at NYU's Skirball Center as part of Zorn's 60th birthday celebration.
lead_paragraph: In a four-and-a-half-hour show, 13 ensembles and soloists helped John Zorn celebrate his 60th birthday and the many ideas in his Masada works.

headline.seo: John Zorn Gets a Masada Marathon for His 60th Birthday
headline.main: A Fraction of a Repertory Is Enough for a Celebration of Productivity
headline.print_headline: A Fraction of a Repertory Is Enough for a Celebration of Productivity
